titleStmt.title: To the general councel, and officers of the army, and to every member in particular Friends, I am moved of the Lord to write unto you, in the name and power of our Lord Jesus Christ; ...
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons, at the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Caption title; title taken from caption title and first lines of text.
Signed and dated at end: Written the 13. of the eighth moneth, in the yeare accounted, 1659. .. Margret Fell.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
